sentences.sentence: Druid of the Talon: In the raven's name!
sentences.translation: 猛禽德鲁伊：亦风暴乌鸦（又解释为渡鸦）之名！

sentences.sentence: The TALON SWORDS is one of the robots most recently fielded in Iraq.
sentences.translation: TALON SWORDS是最近装备在伊拉克的机器人之一。

sentences.sentence: Dampening Talon: This ability will now show up as its own icon when it is affecting a target.
sentences.translation: 潮湿之爪：当这个技能影响一个目标的时候，将显示自己的图标。(看了半天没懂，直译是这样的。)
